title: Add X link to Closing CTA and Flubby Gallery section with new static images

requirements.summary: Make the Closing CTA “Join Community” action a working external X (Twitter) link to https://x.com/ar94595.
acceptanceCriteria: The “Join Community” CTA in the Closing CTA section is clickable and navigates to https://x.com/ar94595.
The link opens in a new tab and uses safe external-link attributes (e.g., rel="noopener noreferrer").
User-facing label clearly indicates X (e.g., “Join on X” or “Join Community on X”) and remains in English.
No backend changes are required for this link to function.

file_operations.description: Replace the disabled “Join Community” button with an external anchor link to https://x.com/ar94595 that opens in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer"; keep styling consistent by composing the existing shadcn-ui Button component (e.g., via supported composition patterns). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add a new “Flubby Gallery” section on the landing page showing at least 6 static images with motivational captions in a responsive grid.
acceptanceCriteria: A new section titled “Flubby Gallery” is visible on the landing page.
The gallery shows at least 6 Flubby images (from new static assets) with a short caption for each item.
All captions are in English and match the site’s emotional “keep trying / never give up” tone.
The gallery layout is mobile-first (single column on small screens) and scales to a multi-column grid on larger screens.
Images are loaded from frontend static assets under /assets/generated and are not fetched from the backend.

file_operations.description: Create the Flubby Gallery landing section component, using existing shadcn-ui Card primitives (and optionally other existing composed UI components) to render a responsive, mobile-first gallery grid with at least 6 items; each item should include an image, English caption, and English alt text, referencing static files under frontend/public/assets/generated. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the new FlubbyGallerySection into the landing page composition (e.g., placed before the ClosingCTASection) so it is visible and navigable as part of the existing landing flow.

requirements.summary: Add the newly generated Flubby gallery images as static assets and reference their exact filenames from the gallery section with appropriate alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: All required new gallery images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated (or the project’s established generated-assets location).
The gallery section references the exact generated filenames provided in the image requirements.
Each gallery image includes appropriate alt text in English.
No image content is served or proxied via the Motoko backend.

file_operations.description: Add generated static asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/flubby-gallery-01.dim_1200x1200.png (Square illustration of Flubby looking determined with a warm uplifting background).
Add generated static asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/flubby-gallery-02.dim_1200x1200.png (Square illustration of Flubby looking tired-but-still-trying, cozy emotional lighting).
Add generated static asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/flubby-gallery-03.dim_1200x1200.png (Square illustration of Flubby getting back up after a stumble, hopeful mood).
Add generated static asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/flubby-gallery-04.dim_1200x1200.png (Square illustration of Flubby cheering a small win, celebratory but gentle tone).
Add generated static asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/flubby-gallery-05.dim_1200x1200.png (Square illustration of Flubby quietly practicing again, calm focused vibe).
Add generated static asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/flubby-gallery-06.dim_1200x1200.png (Square illustration of Flubby with a supportive community vibe, warm and friendly).

Reference the exact generated filenames in the gallery data source (frontend/public/assets/generated/flubby-gallery-01.dim_1200x1200.png through frontend/public/assets/generated/flubby-gallery-06.dim_1200x1200.png) and ensure each image has appropriate English alt text; keep all images strictly served as static assets (no backend calls).
